EmailTemplate.name: peter owings- executive meeting request with gary reiner, former CIO of GE (1495
EmailTemplate.subject: peter owings- executive meeting request with gary reiner, former CIO of GE (1495572887.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Peter, I am reaching out because based on your previous roles as CIO of both Kaye Scholer LLP and Dewey & LeBoeuf, and your current role as CIO of McDermott Will & Emery LLP I wanted to extend an exclusive invitation to meet with former GE SVP & CIO (15 yrs), Gary Reiner (linkedin <[[http://mkto-sjp0104.com/ol/jEBQccHLLlxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhTClK7SnX0iKDUT49Nc6dyksJu8u6w0WRY%2DpuHikjeCBIjdEg%2DYi6zcIZyiDbXBLlxcQm1onn2E5chuyQDtYo%2D2r%2DxU7uO30mp2XPv9QyUM0VTwPTOx1XtBbROkM8ti2g%2DxnQLLs3S5C%5Fq2JUyhy9r7MJ9tExp0cZrIps4uSe%2DeD3ZtqnhddBfV4Dgvu3xsaQlVTkBkrQIST%5FSJHGlDYfBbSNG3Aa1xGwsNxNAdwlXBrYanzafvENzcNhcTii2kXkkxlgX2ax%2D0pzCqA2IUkDMbhrGj0CC4wuwLaYFxUbAvcYl1gjkCzTi6tVbeFaIKczJr0PhSpPEmWUHe6ROX5IrLYTA%5FKPggpJ6/j0FZeMfHKllNoVcspLONbLrkmzDLc5ujtKx4B6G%5FnMwx1Ad7I%5FiAOw66x9UARJYDbevOMlUcMMhl5CFoGNfHctBYrPkPKRi8dRHI17WPV7RJJ%2DAnhJhCyP7x0zgn%5FoWS32XcKnhfUF9rUkvIP7sDo3DhYrIEZSesqimeIdplnSUY3q4Ni8T%2DL%2DDkriXwphOevmfaYgU75cyLsUy1Uc5oyNNU50IhpVZzKOa7t2yew%5FF88CA9uLsujBg296pwd5pt4VWEVTDc8IDzErp2d5SZqujRuMsLRAgRvtF6S13oBXK9GYS8fxZ0qBKeghkdCQI7dB1PItkbgQmsiFxzduc7QWXnvGxw4A%2C%2C]]>). In February Turbonomic announced <[[http://mkto-sjp0104.com/ol/jEBQccHLLlxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhTClK7SnX0iKDUT49Nc6dyksJu8u6w0WRY%2DpuHikjeCBIjdEg%2DYi6zcIZyiDbXBLlxcQm1onn2E5chuyQDtYo%2D2r%2DxU7uO30mp2XPv9QyUM0VTwPTOx1XtBbROkM8ti2g%2DxnQLLs3S5C%5Fq2JUyhy9r7MJ9tExp0cZrIps4uSe%2DeD3ZtqnhddBfV4Dgvu3xsaQlVTkBkrQIST%5FSJHGlDYfBbSNG3Aa1xGwsNxNAdwlXBrYanzafvENzcNhcTii2kXkkxlgX2ax%2D0pzCqA2IUkDMbhrGj0CC4wuwLaYFxUbAvcYl1gjkCzTi6tVbeFaIKczJr0PhSpPEmWUHe6ROX5IrLYTA%5FKPggpJ6/jEFRccHNLFlNoVcspLONbLrkmzDLc5ujtKx4B6G%5FnMwx1Ad7I%5FiAOw66x9UARJYDbevOMlUcMMhl5CFoGNfHctBYrPkPKRi8dRHI17WPV7RJJ%2DAnhJhCyP7x0zgn%5FoWS32XcKnhfUF9rUkvIP7sDo3DhYrIEZSesqimeIdoriDwYlvhX99f5W%5Fbm3We150bJ4jqDPVIz586Wrw6aHItviMRMrUQo7VE1ePOzsRPBza4orDR28uk6jhVgu%5FtzMtAl8haAUCHxqYX3RuZ9D6GnguD9svIkZh16iYovaWqUe331DoeIIjF4rEXZxGZoZG0%2DdWcCW716xETDvHZKLPsHG3e2yy12nGwkmK4Mi4%2D15XbIaTWzZib47Efyygv5KNcAlSeXmpkt7j7oJQzlor17ZGSKNPz8qHiSbYbrjhVgfs9wcekcPLi0z8q4ndUuswnxDnnBlt2ENSoZILwqkfS0meCLr5HllSyHqw%2C%2C]]> $50 million in additional funding, led by General Atlantic and Mr. Reiner, current Operating Partner at General Atlantic, and newest member of Turbonomic’s Board of Directors. (Both the fundraising and growth of Turbonomic’s Board were profiled in Forbes <[[http://mkto-sjp0104.com/ol/jEBQccHLLlxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhTClK7SnX0iKDUT49Nc6dyksJu8u6w0WRY%2DpuHikjeCBIjdEg%2DYi6zcIZyiDbXBLlxcQm1onn2E5chuyQDtYo%2D2r%2DxU7uO30mp2XPv9QyUM0VTwPTOx1XtBbROkM8ti2g%2DxnQLLs3S5C%5Fq2JUyhy9r7MJ9tExp0cZrIps4uSe%2DeD3ZtqnhddBfV4Dgvu3xsaQlVTkBkrQIST%5FSJHGlDYfBbSNG3Aa1xGwsNxNAdwlXBrYanzafvENzcNhcTii2kXkkxlgX2ax%2D0pzCqA2IUkDMbhrGj0CC4wuwLaYFxUbAvcYl1gjkCzTi6tVbeFaIKczJr0PhSpPEmWUHe6ROX5IrLYTA%5FKPggpJ6/jEFZeMLJKllNoVcspLONbLrkmzDLc5ujtKx4B6G%5FnMwx1Ad7I%5FiAOw66x9UARJYDbevOMlUcMMhl5CFoGNfHctBYrPkPKRi8dRHI17WPV7RJJ%2DAnhJhCyP7x0zgn%5FoWS32XcKnhfUF9rUkvIP7sDo3DhYrIEZSesqimeIdoriDwYlvhX99f5W%5Fbm3WS34grA4yeMMUIz586Wrw6aH5B%2DnsRE7Wcl5FU%2Ddu%5F48TTDh%2D4D%2D3Zqoqklq0w%2Ds65UcpotsjWdSzbh64H3QuFtD6ezmfH3r7B8P1M6goljfXzeJBa0CoSdayN9vBKYmjQ2JTJtY2J8T%2D4jgkuWtCYMIrldFnXiyHp0nD1zgf4NmIj1oXSBYSW9PXP69EiozkKmfNQEjyDLwt5tvHPRN065pu5nCET3DKGMqU%5F2S5vZhFU7RaEbRfUzAYya6vqL5v8qgRCAYnCn%5Fdy4EAoiF6M3oYqciviSjeyP5Dv5mmdfsD5MDghczSDFS73KQwdioa4%2C]]>.) I understand that often times it is more compelling to hear from someone who has actually held the same role as you do currently, and as the former CIO of GE, I figured Gary would be excellent in explaining to you why he decided to back Turbonomic and its platform that has helped more than 1,600 CIO’s in ensuring maximum performance, efficiency, and resiliency in their hybrid clouds and data centers. (ie. Manhattan Associates, McMillan LLP, Cisco, HPE, etc. among 1,600+ others) When would be the best time to schedule a 30 minute conversation? Best Regards,Maggie Margaret Schroeder - Turbonomic Sales Development Representative O: 857.305.4608 C: 802.440.2128 500 Boylston Street, Boston, MA 02116
